item.title: Today’s Wordle #1678: Hints and Answer for January 22, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1678 for January 22, 2026

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, January 22, 2026

The Wordle answer for game #1678 is a tougher puzzle. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 4.8 of 6 guesses. That makes it the exact same as the 4.8-guess average from January 21.

General Wordle Hints For January 22

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: This word often describes a brief, sharp sound.
  • Hint 2: It’s commonly associated with hard objects coming into contact.
  • Hint 3: The word is more about the sound itself than the action causing it.
  • Hint 4: You’re most likely to see it in descriptive writing or dialogue.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1678 for January 22, 2026.

Starter Words For January 22, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • KNOLL
  • CLING
  • CLICK

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1678 On January 22, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: CLINK

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

What Does Today’s Wordle Answer Mean?

CLINK is both a verb and a noun. As a verb, it means “to make or cause to make a light, sharp, ringing sound”. As a noun, it can mean “a pointed steel bar for breaking up road surfaces.”

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1677 on January 21, 2026

Answer: CUBIC

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1678?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on January 23 will be Wordle Game #1679.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

For even more Insider Gaming delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our weekly newsletter.

Mike has been covering the gaming industry since 2012, and has reported on some of the largest events in the industry while also working as an investigative reporter. Outside of…

item.title: Is Arknights: Endfield On Steam? How To Buy Arknights: Endfield & Price
item.content:encoded:
Steam is the go-to for most PC gamers. It has almost every game in existence, but some are conspicuously absent, and questions have been asked about Arknights: Endfield. That query will be quashed with a definitive answer, and you’ll also get insight into the game’s price and where to buy it.

Whether you have a gaming laptop or a class PC rig with enough RGB to light up a dark basement, Steam is traditionally the place everyone goes to buy PC games. The odd game deviates from this model. Let’s check if Arknights: Endfield follows in the footsteps of other games—like Hytale—by not launching on Steam right away.

Can You Buy Arknights: Endfield On Steam?

For some reason, Arknights: Endfield is not available to purchase through Steam and needs to be bought via different means on PC.

The closest thing you’ll find to Arknights: Endfield on Steam is the rudimentary-looking, fan-made ‘Ark: Release.’ You’ll find nothing about Endfield on Steam, nor any traces related to it.

If you want to buy Arknights: Endfield, you need to be whisked away elsewhere.

How To Buy Arknight: Endfield On PC

You can download and buy Arknights: Endfield through the Windows App and the Epic Games Store on PC.

Insider Gaming has covered the purchase process extensively in the Arknights: Endfield Pre-Download guide. However, it really is as simple as going to the applicable storefronts, purchasing it, downloading the game’s launcher, and installing the game, ready to play.

It remains unclear if a Steam version will ever become available. If it does, this guide’s content will be updated to reflect the new information.

How Much Is Arknights: Endfield? Price Explained

Arknights: Endfield is a free-to-play action-adventure game, which means you can tie up those purse strings and keep your wallet shut, ready to splurge on future games.

There might be some confusion over the game’s cost if you check out the PS5 store listing, for example. Make no mistake, Arknights: Endfield is F2P. But you can buy a special edition for $9.99 or £7.99, and it comes with the following:

  • Basic HH Permit ×5.
  • T-Creds ×50000.
  • Intermediate Combat Record ×10.
  • Arms Inspector ×10.
  • Fortifying Infusion ×10.

It’s a free-to-play title, but there’s a huge emphasis on its gacha elements and microtransactions. If you get sucked into Arknights: Endfield, it could be a worryingly expensive rabbit hole you get yourself stuck in.

For a game of this size and substance, it’s a good package. Although it’s totally understandable if you think this should be F2P. Let IG know your thoughts on the game, its price, and more through the free-to-join and ever-growing Insider Gaming Discord Server.

There are more Arknights guides to check out: Does Arknights: Endfield have Multiplayer or Co-op? Is Arknights: Endfield on Xbox Game Pass? And all Arknights: Endfield Codes and how to redeem them.

item.title: Does Arknights: Endfield Have Multiplayer? Co-op & Multiplayer, Explained
item.content:encoded:
If you’re looking for a new gacha-RPG, then Arknights: Enfield might be for you. But we all know gaming is better with friends, so there’s one question on everyone’s mind—does Arknights: Endfield have multiplayer?

The game will expand the Arknights universe, which was founded with the original Arknights back in May 2019. Instead of the former tower-defence gameplay, you can expect a fusion between combat and factory-building.

If that’s enough to get you to jump into Arknights: Endfield, then Insider Gaming can let you know whether you can expect multiplayer or co-op during your time on Talos-II.

Does Arknights: Endfield Have Multiplayer?

Arknights: Endfield does feature multiplayer features, but not in the traditional sense.

You won’t find yourself stumbling across other players in Arknights: Endfield, as it’s primarily a single-player experience. However, there are some nifty multiplayer features that you can engage in with your friends, such as:

  • Visiting a friend’s reception room
  • Seeing someone’s team composition
  • Sharing Blueprints and Facilities
  • Helping friends with their OMV Dijiang

Does Arknights: Endfield Have Co-op?

No, Arknights: Endfield does not have co-op, but there is a chance it could be added at a later date.

Unfortunately, you’ll have to stick it out alone in Arknights: Endfield, as there won’t be any co-op at launch. That means you won’t be able to join a friend’s world, but there’s a chance that could change in the future.

Most games of a similar genre tend to have some form of co-op, such as Genshin Impact. Considering over 35 million people have signed up to play, it’d be a real missed opportunity if Hypergryph don’t add co-op in the future. As things stand, though, it remains a pipe dream.

Will you be jumping into Arknights: Endfield? Share your thoughts on the game in the official Insider Gaming Discord.

For more Arknights: Endfield content, check out whether it’s on Game Pass, as well as all the codes you can redeem for the game.

item.title: Crimson Desert Goes Gold Two Months Before Release
item.content:encoded:
The release of Crimson Desert is coming fast. On Wednesday morning, developer Pearl Abyss announced that the game has officially gone gold.

The “gone gold” announcement comes nearly two months before the game’s planned March 19 release date.

“We’re thrilled to announce that Crimson Desert has gone gold,” they said on social media. “On behalf of the team at Pearl Abyss, thank you to our fans around the world for your support and for reaching this milestone with us.

“Stay tuned for more news, and see you in Pywel on March 19!”

With the game going gold, that means, apart from something catastrophic, the game will hit its planned release date. Crimson Desert will be available for $69.99. A Deluxe Edition is also available for $79.99. The Deluxe Edition of the game comes with a Kairos Plate Set, a Balgran Shield, and Exclaire Horse Tack Set.

When it launches in March, Crimson Desert will be available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

Are you excited to dive into Crimson Desert when it releases? Leave your thoughts down below, and join the discussion in the official Insider Gaming Discord.

For more Insider Gaming, check out the footage of Bethesda’s Project Blackbird that recently appeared online. And don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Borderlands 4 Switch 2 Release Date Has Seemingly Surfaced Online
item.content:encoded:
A Portuguese retailer has posted the Switch 2 release date for Borderlands 4, suggesting the game will launch on the platform on February 27, 2026.

For those unaware, the Switch 2 version of Borderlands 4 was delayed indefinitely back in September 2025 as the developers needed additional time to work on the game. Since then, we have yet to receive a new release date from the developers, but it might be arriving soon if the Portuguese listing is indeed true.

Borderlands 4 Switch 2 Game Key Art Listing Appears Online with Release Date

The Borderlands 4 Switch 2 listing has appeared on the Portuguese website, Gaming Replay. The listing states that the release date is set for February 27, 2026, and that it will be a Game Key Card priced at €69.99. Interested buyers in the region can already pre-order the Switch 2 version on the website.

Back in November 2025, the Take Two CEO revealed that the launch sales numbers for Borderlands 4 were “a little softer” than they would’ve liked, but expects it to do well “in the fullness of time”. Hopefully, the Switch 2 launch can help increase these numbers significantly.

Borderlands 4 is the fourth instalment of the highly popular looter shooter series, which features billions of weapons, a variety of enemies, and exciting co-op gameplay. The latest instalment takes players to a brand-new planet called Kairos, which features 4 fresh Vault Hunters. It also features a massive open world filled with enemies, dynamic events, and quests.

In other news, here’s where you can find Bloomreaper the Invincible raid boss in the title. Do you think the Borderlands 4 Switch 2 release date is accurate? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about GameStop patching the “infinite money” trade glitch. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
